description: AzureFile represents an Azure File Service mount on the host and bind mount to the pod.

readOnly.description: Defaults to false (read/write). ReadOnly here will force the ReadOnly setting in VolumeMounts.

secretName.description: the name of secret that contains Azure Storage Account Name and Key

secretNamespace.description: the namespace of the secret that contains Azure Storage Account Name and Key default is the same as the Pod
